name: rock-paper-beer-local
description: Local Rock Paper Beer multiplayer game - migrated from Base44

scripts.build:server: npm run build:game-logic && npm run build --workspace=apps/server
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build:game-logic && npm run build:client
scripts.build:firebase: npm run build:game-logic && npm run build:client && cd functions && npm run build
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build:client && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:functions: cd functions && npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions
